resources.string: The main Goal of the game is to guess the password, you have to guess the numbers in their order. The password will contain 4 numbers.
The numbers you tried will be displayed with their value of accuracy, the accuracy is measured using two variables, namely CORRECT and POSITION. You win if you get 4 for correct and position.
****** Correct: tells you how many of the numbers are found in the password, like if password:4826 and your guess is 8613, then correct will be 2, which is 8 and 6.
****** Position: tells you how many of the correctly guessed numbers are in their exact location on the password. In the above example position will be 0.

Starting from level one to level four, reputation of number and zero are not included in the password, your guess should be free of zero and any reputation of number. 4580, 7297,and 0253 are examples that will be rejected.

Starting from level five to the last level their is no restriction on how the password should be, it only need to be combination of 4 numbers.
\n
-> At level five *** zero is allowed \n
-> At level six *** reputation is allowed \n
-> At level seven *** zero and reputation are allowed \n

In the each level you will have fixed amount of life time: every time you try something the amount will decrease. It will be displayed in the screen. For the first level you will have 15, for the second level 12, for the third level 9, and for the last level 6.

To play Multi Player, press the multi player Button. Then a Layout out with buttons will be displayed, press each one of them carefully.
\n BUTTON ON/OFF
\n This Button Will turn on the bluetooth on your device.
\n BUTTON ENABLE DISCOVERABLE
\n This Button Will turn on the visibility of the device for 300 seconds, so as it could be discoverable by other devices.
\n

BUTTON DISCOVER
\n This button is used to find the available devices to pair with, Then it will display them in the below area. You have to select the device you want to pair with from the list displayed.
\n BUTTON CREATE CONNECTION
\n After selecting the device to pair with, click this button to start the connection. If you did it right it will display interface stating **Connecting**.
\n Then Enter the password and send it.
\n Then Press *Play* Button to start the game.
\n
